name: Platonic Solids
description: Visualization of the five Platonic solids

name: Permutahedron
description: Visualizations of permutahedra based on different root systems

name: Root Polytope
description: Polytopes derived from root systems (A3, B3, C3, D3, H3)

name: Stellahedron
description: Stellahedron polytope constructed using Minkowski sums

name: Orbit Polytope
description: Polytopes derived from the orbit of a point under permutation group action

name: Associahedron
description: Associahedron polytope derived from triangulations of a hexagon
